definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: And what other ways can we make our real world more like these fantasy worlds?
sentences.chinese: 我們又能怎樣把現實世界變得像那夢中的國度呢？

sentences.english: Refugees from the realm of dreams whose minds are as sharp as their swords.
sentences.chinese: 夢境國度的逃難者，思想鋒銳如利劍銀刀。

sentences.english: W2: People think China is a mysterious place.
sentences.chinese: 很多人認爲中國是個神祕的國度。

sentences.english: Tian'anmen square is the bigest square in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國是世界上最大的國度之一。

sentences.english: Premillennialists believe Jesus will come back to make His kingdom in this life.
sentences.chinese: 前千禧年主義者認爲耶穌會回來建立一個屬世的國度。

sentences.english: In the righteous kingdom of God, life is at full tide.
sentences.chinese: 在神公義的國度裏，生命是處於漲潮的狀態。

sentences.english: "A bad country for the hungry, " said he; "that is why I live here.
sentences.chinese: “這個國度不利餓漢，”他說，“所以我住在這裏。

sentences.english: So he appeared in the spirit, in the kingdom of death, not burnt by the dragon's fire, not maimed;
sentences.chinese: 就這樣他出現在了死者的國度，沒有被龍焰毀滅。

sentences.english: The only suchcountry is the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 唯一這樣的國度就是美利堅合衆國。

sentences.english: China is a wehasternativehy country with an extended history.
sentences.chinese: 中國是一個具有悠遠歷史的國度。

sentences.english: Last month I found myself climbing a steep mountain in a distant country.
sentences.chinese: 上個月我發現我自己在一個遠方的國度攀登一座險峯。

sentences.english: She is a questionnaireidcompletely remarketing cihampaigny country.
How do the heavenly worlds exist and subsist?
Family advised him to first two children back to the summer country, pressure Yajing.
sentences.chinese: 家裏人勸他先把兩個孩子送回國度暑假，壓壓驚。

sentences.english: Life is constantly changing and as a nation we somehow always manage to adapt.
sentences.chinese: 在我們或多或少要適應的國度，生活是不斷變化的。

sentences.english: Thanks for a nation of finks.
sentences.chinese: 感謝一個全是告密者的國度。
